      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getNonEmptyLanguage(Context context, String language)
      Returns the locale passed in if it is not null, otherwise returns the device locale

      Returns the unit type for the device locale

      Returns the unit type for the specified locale.
      String inferDeviceLanguage(Context context)
      Returns the device language to default to if no locale was specified

      Returns the device locale for which to use as a default if no language is specified

    • Method Detail

      • getUnitTypeForLocale

        public String getUnitTypeForLocale(@NonNull
                                   Locale locale)
        Returns the unit type for the specified locale. Try to avoid using this unnecessarily because all methods consuming unit type are able to handle the NONE_SPECIFIED type
        Parameters:
        locale - for which to return the default unit type
        Returns:
        unit type for specified locale

      • inferDeviceLanguage

        public String inferDeviceLanguage(Context context)
        Returns the device language to default to if no locale was specified
        Parameters:
        context - to check configuration
        Returns:
        language of device

      • inferDeviceLocale

        public Locale inferDeviceLocale(Context context)
        Returns the device locale for which to use as a default if no language is specified
        Parameters:
        context - to check configuration
        Returns:
        locale of device

      • getNonEmptyLanguage

        public String getNonEmptyLanguage(Context context,
                                  String language)
        Returns the locale passed in if it is not null, otherwise returns the device locale
        Parameters:
        context - to get device locale
        language - to check if it is null
        Returns:
        a non-null locale, either the one passed in, or the device locale

      • getUnitTypeForDeviceLocale

        public String getUnitTypeForDeviceLocale(Context context)
        Returns the unit type for the device locale
        Parameters:
        context - from which to get the configuration
        Returns:
        the default unit type for the device

      • retrieveNonNullUnitType

        public String retrieveNonNullUnitType(Context context,
                                      String unitType)
        Returns the unitType passed in if it is not null, otherwise returns the a unitType based on the device Locale.
        Parameters:
        context - to get device locale
        unitType - to check if it is null
        Returns:
        a non-null unitType, either the one passed in, or based on the device locale
